mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMENT (COMMENT_NO, BOARD_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_BORADCOMMENTNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{commentContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT BC.*, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM BOARD_COMMENT BC JOIN MEMBER M ON BC.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT C.COMMENT_NO, C.COMMENT_CONTENT, C.COMMENT_DATE, C.MEMBER_ID, B.BOARD_CATEGORY, B.VIEW_COUNT FROM BOARD_COMMENT C JOIN BOARD B ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD_COMMENT C JOIN BOARD B ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO
